Class BufferedDrawNodeSharedData

Namespace
osu.Framework.Graphics
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

Contains data which is shared between all BufferedDrawNodes of a Drawable.

public class BufferedDrawNodeSharedData : IDisposable

object

ContainerExtensions.WithChildren<TContainer, TChild>(TContainer, IEnumerable<TChild>)
ContainerExtensions.Wrap<TContainer, TChild>(TContainer, TChild)

Remarks

This should be constructed once per Drawable, and given to the constructor of BufferedDrawNode.

Constructors

BufferedDrawNodeSharedData(int, RenderBufferFormat[], bool, bool)

Creates a new BufferedDrawNodeSharedData with a specific amount of effect buffers.

public BufferedDrawNodeSharedData(int effectBufferCount, RenderBufferFormat[] mainBufferFormats = null, bool pixelSnapping = false, bool clipToRootNode = false)

Parameters

effectBufferCount int

The number of effect buffers.

mainBufferFormats RenderBufferFormat[]

The render buffer formats to attach to the main frame buffer.

pixelSnapping bool

Whether the frame buffer position should be snapped to the nearest pixel when blitting. This amounts to setting the texture filtering mode to "nearest".

clipToRootNode bool

Whether the frame buffer should be clipped to be contained in the root node..

Exceptions

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

If effectBufferCount is less than 0.

BufferedDrawNodeSharedData(RenderBufferFormat[], bool, bool)

Creates a new BufferedDrawNodeSharedData with no effect buffers.

public BufferedDrawNodeSharedData(RenderBufferFormat[] formats = null, bool pixelSnapping = false, bool clipToRootNode = false)

formats RenderBufferFormat[]
pixelSnapping bool

PixelSnapping

Whether the frame buffer position should be snapped to the nearest pixel when blitting. This amounts to setting the texture filtering mode to "nearest".
